name: 地理論著評讀
goals: Be able to be proficient in the basic skills required for geographic research, including GIS operation, map drawing, data collection, organization and analysis, etc.
Being able to possess the basic ability to conduct geographical research, including problem awareness, analysis methods, thesis writing, etc.
Being able to possess the analytical and applied ability of environmental issues, being able to integrate geographical knowledge and skills in environmental assessment and planning.
Being able to continuously participate in the research and further studies to enhance the ability of lifelong learning and career development.
Being able to possess human and technological literacies to solve problems with the ability of thinking, judgment and creativity.
Being able to practice the spirit of scientific research.
syllabus:
1.科學研究的本質與地理學研究之取向  
2.地理研究方法簡介  
3.資料的蒐集與分析  
4.地理論著的內涵  
5.論題的設計與架構  
6.章節的規劃與預期目標  
7.文獻史料解讀(1)  
8.文獻史料解讀(2)  
9.主題研讀與討論(1)  
10.主題研讀與討論(2)  
11.專文報告與評讀(1)  
12.專文報告與評讀(2)  
13.論文計畫寫作  
14.論文計畫書發表  
15.論文計畫修訂  
16.期末考

methodologies.note: 分組學生需選定論文主題與教師討論
選定論文主題尋求問題解決方式
分組選定專題團隊合作
針對論文主題分析與深入研究

grading.note: 論文評讀（學生自選，老師過濾）

prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
